title: Elementary Science Inquiry-Based Learning Design: Application of Responsive Teaching Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic scientific experiment procedures and general knowledge of elementary education curriculum
context.additional_context: Targeting pre-service teachers and educational professionals, aiming to strengthen inquiry-based learning design competencies in a smartphone-based LMS environment.

learning_goals: Students can explain the differences between structured inquiry and guided inquiry and apply them appropriately to situations.
Learners can integrate scientific concepts like thermal insulation into inquiry-based experimental designs.
Instructional designers can apply on-the-fly scaffolding techniques using variable control strategies to real classroom scenarios.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
